mapper.insert: insert into T_CUSTOMERHOLDSUM (CUSTOMERID, COMMODITYID, BS_FLAG, HOLDQTY, HOLDFUNDS, FLOATINGLOSS, EVENPRICE, FROZENQTY, HOLDMARGIN, GAGEQTY, HOLDASSURE, FIRMID, GAGEFROZENQTY) values (#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{holdqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{holdfunds,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{floatingloss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{evenprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozenqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{holdmargin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gageqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{holdassure,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gagefrozenqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
